name: StellarLinkChronicles
description:
Pro Tip: Play on Full Screen! :D About:

StellarLink: Chronicles is a proof of concept for a FPS - Platformer game where you pilot a Turbo Tank and engage in combat with several enemies.

Controls:

WASD keys: Movement

Shift: Boost

Spacebar: Jump

Mouse: Look around

Mouse clicks: Fire left and right cannons

Keys (1,2 & 3): Change weapon

F key: Launch mortar

Something you need to know:

This is a game developed as a final project for my master's degree class. I don't have enough experience using Unity as I use GameMaker Studio 2 as my main development software, so most things you'll see here might seem basic but I'm quite happy with the result, having three weeks to develop all the assets (except for music - I'm not a composer).

The game doesn't have a win or lose condition, so you'll be trapped in forever (as long as you don't close the browser haha). I didn't have enough time to implement any of it as I'm currently writing this text the day before the deadline.

I really hope you have fun and like this proof of concept. Any feedback will be deeply appreciated.
